## tokenizer() function

Create a tokenizer for a CSS string.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function tokenizer(input: {
    css: {
        valueOf(): string;
    };
    unicodeRangesAllowed?: boolean;
}, options?: {
    onParseError?: (error: ParseError) => void;
}): {
    nextToken: () => CSSToken | undefined;
    endOfFile: () => boolean;
};
```
